text: C. Rangarajan or Chakravarthi Rangarajan (born 1932) is an Indian economist. He was the 19th Governor of the Reserve Bank of India. He is the former Chairman of the Prime Minister's Economic Advisory Council. He was a professor in Ahmedabad University. From 1997 to 2003, he was Governor of Andhra Pradesh. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Governors of Andhra Pradesh Category:Governors of Odisha Category:Governors of Tamil Nadu Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: C. Rangarajan
